title: WHAT ABOUT YORICK'S LIFE STEAL
body: as seen by anyone who actually mained yorick, his E ghoul, which gave him an insane amount of life steal in late game made him a champ to be reckoned with, especially when used with his ult. With this taken away, he is left with little to back up apon. WHY DID YOU DO IT RIOT?!?!  Upvote To Spread Da WORD  {{champion:83}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=AchelousPaethon,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IyAdKA4A,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-24T01:46:09.740+0000)
>
> With this taken away, he is left with little to back up apon. 

Except being almost permanently a 2v1 with an army of little death voidlings that can split push 2 lanes at once... So little backup aye...
If you didnt see it his minions die if they are too far away from him.
Soooo im guessing you havent read his kit, his ult can be in top lane (with its own minions) while you are in bot lane with your 4....

When I first saw yorrick; I wanted to like him and I played him and it was funny but he wasn't fun or at least not fun enough to warrant being as expensive as he was. The lifesteal was pretty cool and made him suprisingly able to turn around fights, true but he wasn't very intuitive to play and the ghouls were so squishy and non-stackable that they felt more like buffs rather than an army. I mean might as well play warwick.

I'm sorry you miss the old e but I really like the whole swarming army of the dead idea and with this new update he looks strong and actually playable outside of normals. I'm not saying old yorrick didn't have his moments but he wasn't all that strong, his ult was like a worse zilean ult and even when he was ahead he wasn't much of a threat and if he fell behind he was next to useless since he pretty much only had damage and no mobility in his kit.

This new direction also opens alot more complexity, utility and paths in his kit since his old version was extremely simple since his ghouls were more like buffs than separate assistants. Personally I think new yorrick will have some new interesting roles like full ad lifesteal jungler (I mean look at that damage in the champion preview when all his ghouls rushed at them, that's some strong ganking potential) and tank yorrick support since he now has some pretty good utility and probably good base damage and his ult will have good survivability standing next to the ad carry as a second ad carry to back him up making botlane a 3v2.
